content:
## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Iron Smelting Facility at Position (-10.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone Furnace at position (-10.0, -50.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (-9.5, -48.5) that feeds the furnace

### Coal Refueling System
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Inserter at position (-15.5, -53.5) with coal in its inventory
- Burner Inserter at position (-13.5, -52.5) with coal in its inventory
- Burner Inserter at position (-9.5, -48.5) with coal in its inventory

### Transport Belt Network
Consists of the following entities:
- BeltGroup with belts from position (x=-16.5, y=-54.5) to (x=-14.5, y=-54.5)
- BeltGroup with belts from position (x=-14.5, y=-50.5) to (x=-16.5, y=-50.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when Extracting Items from Furnace
- Ensure that the furnace contains the items you wish to extract before attempting extraction. Verify that the furnace has both fuel and input materials.

### Errors when Connecting Belts to Furnace
- Belts cannot be directly connected to a furnace. Use an inserter to transfer items between belts and furnaces.

### Errors when Finding Suitable Position for Burner Inserter
- Ensure there is enough space and no obstructions at the intended position before placing a burner inserter.

### Errors due to Missing Attributes in Code
- Double-check the attributes of objects in your code. Ensure that you are using the correct attribute names and that the objects have the attributes you are trying to access.

### Errors when Crafting Items without Required Ingredients
- Ensure all required ingredients are available before attempting to craft an item. For example, iron plates must be smelted in a furnace before they can be used in crafting.
